name: Mega Man X7 (2003)
description:
Mega Man X7 (2003) is an action-platformer game developed by Capcom Production Studio 3. It was originally released in 2003. Capcom published the game. Mega Man X7 (2003) has a Metascore of 58, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Mega Man X7 (2003) is available on Xbox One, PC, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 2.
